com.guerzonica.app.channel.models

Class Packet<C extends Streammable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guerzonica.app.channel.models.Container
      • com.guerzonica.app.channel.models.Packet<C>

  • public class Packet<C extends Streammable>
extends Container
    Websocket message (with content).
    • Provides the minimal information required by a message to be sent and received on the Channel instance (for details).
    • Allow to insert parametrized content inside the message. Content can be any type that implements the Streammable interface
    Author:
    Matteo Guerzoni
